headline.main: HALSEY PREDICTS VICTORY THIS YEAR; ' Complete, Absolute Defeat for Axis' in 1943 Forecast by the South Pacific Naval Chief

lead_paragraph: WITH THE UNITED STATES FLEET, in the South Pacific, Jan. 2 -- Victory for the United Nations this year is the prediction of Admiral William Halsey, commander of the South Pacific Force of the Pacific Fleet.
abstract: Dispatch on int with Adm W F Halsey
snippet: WITH THE UNITED STATES FLEET, in the South Pacific, Jan. 2 -- Victory for the United Nations this year is the prediction of Admiral William Halsey, commander of the South Pacific Force of the Pacific Fleet....

byline.original: By J. NORMAN LODGE Associated Press Correspondent
